result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stephanie Marie Hughes

records.addlTxt: Filed by DA Office Erin M. arc
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on November 10, 2022 at 09:30 am.

8:32 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: K. Anderson, Attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Stephanie Marie Hughes. Defendant Stephanie Marie Hughes in court. INCLUDES 22CF522 (ARGN), 22CF523 (ARGN), 22CM399 (STC), 22CM507 (Set for INIT), 22TR2358 (STC) and 22TR2359 (STC). 22CF522 and 22CF523 (ARGN): NG. 22CM507: Atty. Dofli notes she believes these charges were already added to another case. ADA Smestad requests additional time to review offense dates of new charges. DE confirms address. Court sets hearings. Adjourned: 8:40 AM. kma
Filed by ADA Smestad. arc   e: Atty Dolfi

9:31 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox, Defendant Stephanie Marie Hughes in court.  Attorney Bela A. Ballo in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Stephanie Marie Hughes. Includes PH on 22CF522 and 22CF523 and STC on 22CM399, 22TR2358, & 22TR2359. Court proceeds to preliminary hearings. 
- Preliminary Hearing case 22CF522 S/T Officer Michael Dishno. Direct by ADA Ballo. Cross by Atty Dolfi. Redirect by ADA Ballo. Attorney argument. Crt finds Def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives preliminary hearing. Crt finds probable cause and binds Def over for trial. 
- Preliminary hearing case 22CF523: S/T Sgt M. Thomason. Direct by ADA Ballo. Cross by Atty Dolfi. Redirect. Atty argument. Crt finds Def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives preliminary hearing. Crt finds probable cause and binds Def over for trial. 

Address is confirmed. 
Adjourned at: 10:15 am
Arraignment scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Stephanie Marie Hughes
Current: 18203 Empire Trail, Farmington, MN 55024 United States  (Effective: 08-02-2022)
Prior: 1220 1/2 Maple St, Baldwin, WI 54002 
per def in court. sf

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
The original document was titled: Pretrial Assessment Report
The original history event date is: 08-03-2022
Pretrial Assessment Report. SEALED w/ access to parties.  gll

Includes 22CM399, 22CF522, 22CF523

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  P.R. and 38 6th Ave Baldwin, WI and  C.L.H and 1220 maple street Baldwin, WI.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
Preliminary hearing on August 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.

1:13 PM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Stephanie Marie Hughes. Defendant Stephanie Marie Hughes appeared by video, in custody. Includes 22CM399, 22CF522, 22CF523-INIT, 22TR2359, & 22TR2358- IN . Court reviews case. DE confirms address and DOB. DE understands charges and possible penalties. Waive reading. DE does qualify for PD. Enter NG pleas entered in 22CM399, 22TR2359, and 22TR2358. Bond argument. Court orders bond. Court sets PH in case 22CF522 and 22CF523 and STC in all other files. Adjourned
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.
for copies; filed by Baldwin Bulletin. Rec'd via fax. Clerk faxed copies w/ invoice.  gll

2:06 PM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Stephanie Marie Hughes not in court.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Stephanie Marie Hughes. Includes 22CM399, 22CF522, 22CF523-INIT, 22TR2359, & 22TR2358- IN. Court makes record of Defendant's disruption and was removed.
